entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then clearing. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon.
